mapper.insert: INSERT INTO playlist(channel_id, name, public, thumbnail) VALUES(#{playlist.channelId}, #{playlist.name}, #{playlist.visible}, #{playlist.thumbnail})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM playlist WHERE playlist_id = #{playlist.playlistId} AND channel_id = #{playlist.channelId}
mapper.select: SELECT playlist_id as playlistId, channel_id as channelId, name, public as visible, video_count as videoCount, thumbnail FROM playlist WHERE channel_id = #{channelId}
SELECT playlist_id as playlistId, video_id as videoId FROM playlist_item WHERE playlist_id = #{playlistId} AND video_id = #{videoId}
